turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you please order me a Starbucks coffee drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure; which Starbucks do you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order it from the one on Saw Mill Road in West Haven?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay; what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order me their Caffe Latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is regular milk okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, can you change it to have nonfat milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, do you want any flavors added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get their new brown butter shortbread sauce added in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, how many pumps of flavor?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two pumps please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, are 2 espresso shots enough?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any other special add-ins or toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you add regular salt topping please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, anything else in the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks; just the drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so I'll order a grande Caffe Latte with 2 shots espresso, nonfat milk, 2 pumps brown butter sauce, and regular salt topping. Does that sound correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I have placed the order. It will be ready shortly at the Saw Mill Road location. You will receive your receipt via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you! You're the best.
